heading: HR00679
0: RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING ATHLETES FROM THE PROVINCE OF BOHOL WHO WON AND PARTICIPATED IN THE 2019 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES HELD IN THE PHILIPPINES LAST 30 NOVEMBER TO 11 DECEMBER 2019
mother-bill statusstatus: Adopted as Resolution No. HR00050 on 2020-03-10 Substituted by HR00776
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00679
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING ATHLETES FROM THE PROVINCE OF BOHOL WHO WON AND PARTICIPATED IN THE 2019 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES HELD IN THE PHILIPPINES LAST 30 NOVEMBER TO 11 DECEMBER 2019
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CHATTO, EDGAR M.
DATE FILED : 2020-01-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-03-04
          -On account of the subsequent referrals of HR Nos. 679, 680 and 690, the body approved their inclusion in the preparation of the substitute resolution which seeks to commend the national athletes for their exemplary performance, as well as the organizing committee for its successful hosting of the 30th SEAGAMES. The Chairman directed the Secretariat to prepare a substitute resolution, in substitution of HR Nos. 573,596, 601, 605, 606, 608, 622, 629, 640, 679, 680 and 690, as well as its corresponding committee report.
          -Initial consideration of HR Nos. 679, 680 and 690
MOTHER BILL: HR00776
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2020-02-04
